name: Neon Echo
description:
Neon Echo is an interactive sound toy. 

Move your mouse (or finger on a touch screen) to flip tiles and make sounds. Turn on pxl for some 8-bit fun. Explore auto mode for generative ambient music (cycle through 3 different options).

PS- There is no right way to play it, just lose yourself in the sounds.

Made by @zenaranya.
